name: 6F6 Must Fall
description:
Dear [Object Object]

Thank you [Object Object] for applying for the position of asset requisition officer and we are pleased to welcome you to Kwacha Galactic Trading Federation. Your task is simple go to the abandoned sky lab on planet designation 6F6 and reactivate the 5 dormant communication satellites to ensure asset retrieval. You will be assigned the KGTF asset retrieval kit, all damages will be taken out of your pay.

Yours Sincerely

KGTF HR Department

Welcome to the prototype demo of my game 6F6 Must Fall, a first person adventure platformer set on a lab in the stratosphere of the distant planet designated 6F6.  What dangers lay hidden in the clouds, what secrets does the KGTF want to keep hidden from the galaxy. 

I am still early in development of this project and I just wanted to show the progress I have made.  Please note this is still a prototype and has many rough edges. 

My Current goals for the project

-Better enemy ai

-more enemies

-enemy redesign

-more environments 

-better weapons

- more gameplay elements

- and music and sound effects

I hope to release the full game by mid/late 2023. If  this  project has peeked your interest follow me on Instagram for more updates on it or checkout my website for more information. 

The project currently needs funding so if you feel this project has potential and you want to see it grow, you can support the project through the support button after hitting download. Your support will allow me to dedicate more time to the project and allow me to fully build up the concept and actually get help building this. 

 Your feedback or suggestions will be helpful!
